meanings.definition: To look at carefully in search of flaws.
meanings.sent1: The detective inspected the crime scene for any clues.
meanings.sent2: She inspected the document to make sure there were no errors.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat inspected the new toy with great interest.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes inspected every detail of the painting, trying to find hidden meanings.
meanings.sent5: The teacher inspected each student's work to ensure they followed the instructions.

meanings.definition: To examine or review carefully and critically.
meanings.sent1: The supervisor inspected the report before submitting it.
meanings.sent2: He inspected the car before deciding to buy it.
meanings.sent3: The chef inspected the dish, looking for ways to improve it.
meanings.sent4: She inspected the proposal, searching for any loopholes.
meanings.sent5: The scientist inspected the data to draw accurate conclusions.
